rolesAndResponsibilities: 1. Develop and implement embedded systems solutions using ESP32 programming.
2. Assist in soldering components onto printed circuit boards (PCBs) following best practices.
3. Collaborate with the team to design and prototype PCBs for various projects.
4. Troubleshoot and debug embedded systems to ensure functionality and performance.
5. Participate in testing and quality assurance processes to validate system integrity.

Note: This job description is intended to convey information essential to understanding the scope of the intern position. Specific duties and responsibilities may vary based on project requirements and organizational needs.
Contribute to the creation and optimization of Cloud Pages to enhance the overall effectiveness of the program.
requirements: 1. Proficiency in ESP32 programming and development.
2. Basic knowledge of soldering techniques and PCB assembly.
3. Familiarity with PCB design tools and software.
4. Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
5. Ability to work effectively in a team environment.
6. Excellent communication and organizational skills.
7. Enthusiasm to learn and contribute to real-world embedded systems projects.
8. Pursuing a degree in electrical engineering, computer engineering, or a related field.
9. Previous experience with embedded systems development.
10. Understanding of circuit design principles and schematic capture.
Only those candidates can apply who:
1. are available for full time (in-office) internship
2. can start the internship between 2nd Jan'25 and 6th Feb'25
3. are available for duration of 3 months
4. have relevant skills and interests

rolesAndResponsibilities: 1. Develop reusable components
2. Match the UI design with 90% accuracy
3. Integrate and develop the functionality
4. Make the overall code to high performance
5. Develop API on nodejs and must have good knowledge with sql and nosql databases
If you are not able to do things mentioned above, please dont apply for this internship, You would face problems while interview and that will lead to high chance of rejection of the candidature.
requirements: Only those candidates can apply who:

positionType: Internship Full Time - with job offer

rolesAndResponsibilities: Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:
1. Solve fast-paced assignments and hands-on exercises based on Python, Pandas, Numpy, APIs, and SQL
2. Get reviewed by the tests at end of each module during the training period
3. Work on strong foundation case studies and projects assigned to take out your best version
4. Interact with employees in the organization to better understand the industry and real-life projects
Skills & Requirements:
1. Should be available for a full-time in-office internship for 3 months starting in March 2025.
2. Applicable for students passed out in 2023, 2024 and passing out in 2025.
3. Good knowledge of developing APIs and managing database systems in Python and SQ, will be appreciated.
Perks:
1. On exceptional performance, get a chance to collaborate with data scientists, engineers, and architects on several projects
